Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GodCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GodCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Poseidon, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
public class GodCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
General god card class
See Also:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void afterBuildHandler​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerBuild playerBuild, Cell buildingCell)
    This method has to be overridden if a god card needs to perform an action after the build in done (even if the turn has changed)
    void beforeMoveHandler​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
    This method has to be overridden if a god card has to configure something before the turn starts, making controls for the move action
    boolean checkBuilt​(Controller controller, Cell buildingCell, PlayerBuild playerBuild)
    This returns the default controller's check build OVERRIDE this method to change the controls
    java.util.ArrayList<Cell> checkCanBuild​(Worker worker, GodCardController controller)
    This method checks every cell around the worker are free and with a level lower then a dome If true the cell is added to the available cells list.
    boolean checkCell​(GodCardController controller, int x, int y, Worker actualWorker, int maxUpDifference)
    This method returns the default controller check cell OVERRIDE this method to change the control
    boolean checkVictory​(Model model, GodCardController controller)
    This function has to be overridden if a god card has a particular winning condition In particular, it can be used to check if he has won when is not his turn
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
    Gods getCardGod()  
    java.lang.String getName()  
    Phase getPhase()  
    boolean handlerBuild​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerBuild build, Cell buildingCell)
    This method has to be overridden to make controls in a build action for a god power This has to return false if you want to use the standard move action and controls This has to return true if a different set of controls has been done (also report error have to return true in order to skip the move action)
    boolean handlerMove​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
    This method can be used (by override) to perform controls for the move This has to return false if you want to use the standard move action and controls This has to return true if a different control has been done
    boolean isActive()  
    void normalMoveModifier​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
    This method could be used to modify parameters before calling the default model.move
    void performGodMessageForPhaseWithNegativeAnswer​(Phase phase, Controller controller)
    This method is called when a player answers 'no' when a "use god power" request is asked It by default sets the model's phase and messages to the default next value, based on the god card's actual phase given as param A particular control is made for Prometheus because his power has to be activated during the turn change
    void setActive​(boolean active)  
    void turnStartHandler​(GodCardController godCardController, int blockId, Cell cell)
    This method has to be overridden if a god card needs some action at the player's turn beginning
    void usePower​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objectList)
    This function is used to perform actions with the god power It has to be overridden in subclasses to define the behavior

    clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GodCard

      public GodCard​(Gods card, Phase phase)
      Class' constructor
      Parameters:
      card - is the God's enum instance to create the model's cards
      phase - is the phase in which the gods power should be activated

  • Method Details

    • getCardGod

      public Gods getCardGod()
      Returns:
      the Gods enum instance of the card created in this class

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the god

    • usePower

      public void usePower​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objectList)
      This function is used to perform actions with the god power It has to be overridden in subclasses to define the behavior
      Parameters:
      objectList - is a generic list of Objects

    • checkCell

      public boolean checkCell​(GodCardController controller, int x, int y, Worker actualWorker, int maxUpDifference) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method returns the default controller check cell OVERRIDE this method to change the control
      Parameters:
      controller - is the game's controller
      x - is the x value of the cell
      y - is the y value of the cell
      actualWorker - is the worker selected by the player
      maxUpDifference - is the max difference between move cell levels allowed for the action
      Returns:
      the result of controller check cell
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if check cell throws it

    • beforeMoveHandler

      public void beforeMoveHandler​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
      This method has to be overridden if a god card has to configure something before the turn starts, making controls for the move action
      Parameters:
      model - is the game's model
      controller - is the game's controller
      move - is the move message received from the view

    • handlerMove

      public boolean handlerMove​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
      This method can be used (by override) to perform controls for the move This has to return false if you want to use the standard move action and controls This has to return true if a different control has been done
      Parameters:
      model - is the game's model
      controller - is the game's controller
      move - is the move message received from the view
      Returns:
      always false if not overridden

    • normalMoveModifier

      public void normalMoveModifier​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
      This method could be used to modify parameters before calling the default model.move
      Parameters:
      model - the play model
      controller - the play controller
      move - the move message received from the view

    • checkBuilt

      public boolean checkBuilt​(Controller controller, Cell buildingCell, PlayerBuild playerBuild)
      This returns the default controller's check build OVERRIDE this method to change the controls
      Parameters:
      controller - is the game's controller
      buildingCell - the cell where the player wants to build
      playerBuild - the message received from the view
      Returns:
      the controls results

    • handlerBuild

      public boolean handlerBuild​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerBuild build, Cell buildingCell)
      This method has to be overridden to make controls in a build action for a god power This has to return false if you want to use the standard move action and controls This has to return true if a different set of controls has been done (also report error have to return true in order to skip the move action)
      Parameters:
      model - is the game's model
      controller - is the game's controller
      build - is the message received from the view
      buildingCell - is the cell where the player wants to build
      Returns:
      always false if not overridden

    • turnStartHandler

      public void turnStartHandler​(GodCardController godCardController, int blockId, Cell cell)
      This method has to be overridden if a god card needs some action at the player's turn beginning
      Parameters:
      godCardController - is the game's controller
      blockId - is the game's id of the cell
      cell - is the cell where the player wants to build

    • afterBuildHandler

      public void afterBuildHandler​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerBuild playerBuild, Cell buildingCell)
      This method has to be overridden if a god card needs to perform an action after the build in done (even if the turn has changed)
      Parameters:
      model - is the game's model
      controller - is the game's controller
      playerBuild - is the building message received from the view
      buildingCell - is the cell where the player has built

    • checkVictory

      public boolean checkVictory​(Model model, GodCardController controller)
      This function has to be overridden if a god card has a particular winning condition In particular, it can be used to check if he has won when is not his turn
      Parameters:
      model - is the game's mode
      controller - is the game's controller
      Returns:
      false if not overridden.

    • performGodMessageForPhaseWithNegativeAnswer

      public void performGodMessageForPhaseWithNegativeAnswer​(Phase phase, Controller controller)
      This method is called when a player answers 'no' when a "use god power" request is asked It by default sets the model's phase and messages to the default next value, based on the god card's actual phase given as param A particular control is made for Prometheus because his power has to be activated during the turn change
      Parameters:
      phase - is the god card phase given by the controller
      controller - is the game's controller

    • checkCanBuild

      public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> checkCanBuild​(Worker worker, GodCardController controller)
      This method checks every cell around the worker are free and with a level lower then a dome If true the cell is added to the available cells list.
      Parameters:
      worker - is the worker to control
      controller - the controller instance
      Returns:
      a list of cells where a build can be done

    • getPhase

      public Phase getPhase()
      Returns:
      the phase in which the god power can be used

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(boolean active)
      Parameters:
      active - is a flag representing if the god card is active in the turn

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns:
      true if the god card has been activated in the turn
